Literature.Title: Isopedopeptins A-H: Cationic Cyclic Lipodepsipeptides from Pedobacter cryoconitis UP508 Targeting WHO Top-Priority Carbapenem-Resistant Bacteria
Literature.Author: Nord C, Bjerketorp J, Levenfors JJ, Cao S, Strömstedt AA, Guss B, Larsson R, Hughes D, Öberg B, Broberg A

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Escherichia coli LMG 15862(MIC=16µg/ml),Acinetobacter baumannii LMG 1041(MIC=16µg/ml),Enterobacter cloacae LMG 2783(MIC=32µg/ml),Klebsiella pneumoniae LMG 20218(MIC=32µg/ml),Pseudomonas aeruginosa LMG 6395(MIC=32µg/ml),Staphylococcus aureus LMG 15975(MIC=>32µg/ml),Bacillus cereus CCUG 7414T(MIC=32µg/ml),Aspergillus fumigatus J7(MIC=>32µg/ml),Candida albicans H-29(MIC=32µg/ml),Human hepatocellular carcinoma HepG2(IC50=33µg/ml)
